resume.title: Name
resume.objectives: I am seeking a cooperative position in the field of public relations to gain experience and demonstrate the skills I have learned through previous job experience and formal education

job.job_summary: Work with international brands in the Greater Boston area for e-commerce use. Work closely with photographers, fashion coordinators, directors, producers, stylists, makeup artists, other models, and clients to produce the desired looks, and to finish photo shoots on schedule.
Check in customers and assist with bike set-up Create a warm and welcoming environment for customers
Utilized effective sales skills to raise money in the form of donations to USD. Brought in 15 new donors within 3 months. Raised a total of $7215.00 as of December 1st, 2015.

education.degree: Communication Studies. Minors in Media Production and Business

resume.additional_information: Surfrider Foundation member. Participate in beach cleanups and fundraising events. July 2015- Present.
